Product Description

X3 is locked and loaded, prepared for something you’ll be able to dish out on the paths, the slopes, within the fitness center or on the streets. Patented sports activities ear fins hug into the highest, again and decrease floor areas of the ear, offering an excellent-safe comfy match. The micro-sized design means you’ll be able to comfortably put on your X3 beneath a helmet and wherever your lively life takes you. The 8-hour battery* means you’ll by no means skip a beat and the customisable sound means you’ll by no means complain about too little or not sufficient bass – you’re now in management.
